column4: Sigh.. just installed jaunty on an old pc with a geforce4 mx 440 card.. installed restricted nvidia drivers but on boot it just goes black (or sometimes black with a frozen cursor) but no x errors or anything.
why's everyone calling me vix85? :|
bah, i thought jaunty had ironed out most of the nvidia issues
nope, jauty hasmore issues than the others with nvidia
really? then is it worth updating?
update should be fine. bu fresh is troublesome
y'think you could help me out too? :[
issue?
installed nvidia drivers via restricred drivers manager. reboot.. loading bar completes.. black.
thankss
get the .run from nvidia.com
puit in /root
reboot to SAFE mode, rot shel, sh ~/***.run
alright, sounds good
same proces I used, worksfor me :)
which driver do you recommend?
which driver *version do you recommend?
newest
but I have an old GPU
which recommends the 96.XX drivers..
what card, pm it to me
